close-with-changes.title: Are you sure?
close-with-changes.description: You have unsaved changes. If you close without saving, you will lose your changes. Are you sure you want to quit?

other-main-score-in-use.title: A main score has already been defined
other-main-score-in-use.description: Do you want to make this score your main score?

delete-main-score.title: Are you sure?
delete-main-score.description: You are about to delete the main score of your simulation. Are you sure you want to continue?

beta.name: Beta
beta.caption: This content is in its experimental version.

saved-since.hour-ago: Saved one hour ago | Saved {time} hours ago
saved-since.days-ago: Saved one day ago | Saved {time} days ago

subscriptions.audio: Subscribe to an audio plan to unlock this configuration | Subscribe to an audio plan to unlock these configurations
subscriptions.video: Subscribe to a video plan to unlock this configuration | Subscribe to a video plan to unlock these configurations

saving-changes.error: An error occurred while saving changes.

exporting-scorm.success: Your simulation has been exported to SCORM {version}!
exporting-scorm.error: An error occurred while exporting the simulation.

general.title: General information
general.description: Configure the display and game options of your simulation.

no-mode-selected.title: No simulation mode selected.
no-mode-selected.description: At least one active option is required to save!

text.title: Text mode
text.description: Your learners will play in an SMS-like conversation.

audio.title: Audio mode
audio.description: Your learners will be in contact with the agent via a phone call.

video.title: Video mode
video.description: Your learners will meet the agent in a video conference.

questions.label: Question preparation
questions.description: The following questions will help the agent prepare for the conversation.

empty.title: No questions
empty.description: You haven't added any questions yet. Start by adding one to the simulation.

customize.title: Experience customization
customize.description: Ask learners questions to personalize their conversation.

empty.title: No questions
empty.description: You haven't added any customization questions yet. Start by adding one to the simulation.

engine.title: Simulation engine
engine.description: Configure the scenario and enabled options for your simulation.

system-prompt.label: System instructions
system-prompt.description: Describe the simulation content, its scenario, its possible outcomes.

alert.title: Risk of agent hallucination
alert.description: A temperature above {value} makes generation chaotic. Excessive creativity can make the simulation almost incoherent.

model.label: Generation model
model.description: Select the model that best fits your final use.

eleven_turbo_v2_5.name: Low latency
eleven_turbo_v2_5.caption: Decent audio quality and low latency.

eleven_v3.name: Emotional
eleven_v3.caption: High audio fidelity with emotion interpretation.

stability.label: Stability
stability.tooltip-v3:
Manage boldness:
· Creative: expressive, varied phrasing and tones, can even sing
· Natural: conversational balance
· Robust: precise, stable and predictable

enhance-audio.label: Enhance audio
enhance-audio.description: If enabled, the video will use the voice settings configured above.

no-end-mode-selected.title: No end mode selected.
no-end-mode-selected.description: At least one active option is required to save!

by-ai.label: By agent
by-ai.description: The conversational agent will be able to decide to exit.
by-ai.alert: Warning, if you enable this option, you must integrate exit scenarios into the system instructions of your simulation, otherwise the agent will not be able to exit the simulation.

by-time.label: Time-limited (in minutes)
by-time.description: The user will have a limited time to complete their simulation.

by-user.label: By user
by-user.description: The user will be able to decide to exit their simulation at any time.

evaluation.title: Evaluation
evaluation.description: Design the simulation report generated at the end of the simulation game.

empty.title: No sections
empty.description: You haven't added any sections yet. Start by adding one to the evaluation.

evaluation-method.label: Evaluation method
evaluation-method.description: Describe how the agent should evaluate the conversation.

empty.title: No axes
empty.description: You haven't added any axes yet. Start by adding one to the graph.

writing-method.label: Writing method
writing-method.description: Describe to the agent how they should write their feedback.
